name: shopping_cart_simple_demo
description: ## Setup 1. Install [Node.js](https://nodejs.org/en/download/package-manager/) if you haven't already 2. Clone this repository 3. `cd` into the downloaded directory 4. `cd` into client and run `npm install` from the command line to install all dependencies 5. `cd` into server and run `npm install` from the command line to install all dependencies
